state.VS: discarded - work was on the list (A)
state.VN: discarded - the work was on the draft list (PA)

tooltip.undefined: unclassified - the work is not included in the List, it is freely available for proposal for inclusion
tooltip.PA: work published as Proposal for inclusion in the list, it runs for 6 months until reassignment to status A
tooltip.A: included - the work is included in the List and has assigned licenses for use. In the case of the digital version, a link to the work in a Kramerius digital library (DK) is available
tooltip.VS: discarded - the work was on List (A), but is discarded; the work may be subject to NZN or administrative corrections
tooltip.VN: discarded - the work was on the Draft List (PA), but is discarded; the work may be subject to NZN or administrative corrections
tooltip.N: unclassified - the work is not included in the List, it is freely available for proposal for inclusion
tooltip.NZN: proposal for inclusion in the Draft List (internal state of administration)
tooltip.VVN: request for exclusion from the List Design (internal state of administration)
tooltip.VVS: request to be removed from the List (internal state of administration)

field.PA: PA: work published as a draft
field.VS: VS: discarded - the work was on the list (A)
field.VN: VN: discarded - the work was on the draft list (PA)

registracni_podminky.podminka_1: I acknowledge that, upon registration, a registered entity - copyright holder is allowed to exclude works from the List of Works Unavailable on the Market or Proposals for inclusion in the List of Works Unavailable on the Market pursuant to Section 97f (5) of the Act No. 121/2000 Coll., Copyright Act, as amended.
registracni_podminky.podminka_2: I acknowledge that upon registration, a registered entity - publisher / publisher - is allowed to restrict the manner in which a work unavailable on the market published between 2001 and 2007 is made available for display on a library terminal (on-site).
registracni_podminky.podminka_3: I agree to the processing of personal data. The National Library of the Czech Republic (hereinafter referred to as the National Library) in the area of ensuring the protection of natural persons in connection with the processing of their personal data at NK workplaces is governed by the provisions of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and the Council of 27 April 2016 in connection with the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data and on the repeal of Directive 95/46 / EC (General Regulation on the Protection of Personal Data), known as the GDPR and Act No. 110/2019 Coll., on the processing of personal data.

desc.narodni_knihovna_ceske_republiky: National Library od the Czech Republic
